General.Name: DINE S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: DINE, S.A.B. de C.V. develops real estate projects in Mexico. It primarily develops residential, tourism, commercial, and corporate projects. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Mexico City, Mexico.
